short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search for product recalls using this Chrome Extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: mRecall was designed for MicroHealth employees to help search Recalls.gov for products that may pose a health hazard.  The data is powered by Recalls.gov which alerts the American people to unsafe, hazardous or defective products from six federal agencies.  You are more than welcome to use this application however it was designed for internal use at MicroHealth therefore support will be limited.  The content is NOT intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, safety advice, safety precautions, manufacturers warnings, diagnosis, or treatment.
